mapper.select: select str.report_code report_code, str.report_name report_name, str.report_desc report_desc, str.proc_name proc_name from apps.stat_biz_report str

select sbrp.parameter_name parameter_name, sbrp.parameter_type parameter_type, sbrp.parameter_desc parameter_desc, sbrp.parameter_class parameter_class, sbr.report_name report_name, sbrp.sequence sequence, '' parameter_value, sbr.report_code from apps.stat_biz_report sbr, apps.stat_biz_report_parameter sbrp where sbrp.report_code = sbr.report_code and sbr.report_code = #{report_code} order by sequence
